bankingContent.title: Banking
bankingContent.subtitle: Manage your church's financial accounts, payouts, and tax information

alert.title: Account Verification Required
alert.description: Please complete your account verification to enable all banking features and receive payouts.

account.title: Banking Account Overview
account.description: View and manage your connected bank accounts and balance information
account.pendingBalanceSubtitle: Processing and will be available soon
account.pendingBalanceNote: Funds typically clear in 2-7 business days
account.addAccountPrompt: Add another bank account for payouts
account.stripeDescription: This section will contain the embedded Stripe Connect components for account management.
account.stripePlaceholder: Stripe Connect Account Dashboard will be embedded here

payouts.title: Payout History
payouts.description: View and manage your payouts to connected bank accounts
payouts.stripeDescription: This section will contain the embedded Stripe Connect components for payout management.
payouts.stripePlaceholder: Stripe Connect Payouts Dashboard will be embedded here

tax.title: Tax Information
tax.description: Manage your tax documents and reporting information

tax.stripePlaceholder: Stripe Connect Tax Dashboard will be embedded here

settings.title: Banking Settings
settings.description: Configure your banking preferences and security settings
settings.stripeDescription: This section will contain the embedded Stripe Connect components for account settings.
settings.stripePlaceholder: Stripe Connect Settings Dashboard will be embedded here
settings.apiDescription: Manage API keys and webhooks for your banking integration
settings.helpDescription: Contact our support team for banking assistance
